pages.text: #game { width: 100%; margin-top: 32px; text-align: center; } #msg { width: 100%; text-align: center; font-size: 70px; font-family: PingFang SC, Helvetica Neue, Hiragino Sans GB, Segoe UI, Microsoft YaHei, sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: #4f565f; } .have_rest { height: 41px; background: url("/images/have_rest.png") center no-repeat rgba(255, 255, 255, .8); } .main-inner { margin-top: 60px; padding: 60px 60px 60px 60px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1) !important; min-height: 500px; border-radius: 5px; } @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { canvas{ margin-left: -94px; } }
